main.java.pds.ui

Class GeneralView

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.pds.ui.GeneralView
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminView, ManagerReportView, ManagerReportView

    public abstract class GeneralView
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides an abstraction for the View.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  GeneralView.OutputChannel
      The abstraction of the input channel.

    • Method Detail

      • getController

        public GeneralController getController()
        Returns:
        This view's controller.

      • setController

        public void setController(GeneralController controller)
        Parameters:
        controller - The new controller.

      • setChannelEnabled

        public abstract void setChannelEnabled(InputChannel inChannel,
                     boolean enabled)
        Test this view to enable input to the given input channel. This method must be implemented by all GeneralView subclasses.
        Parameters:
        inChannel - The channel to be enabled.
        enabled - Whether or not to enable input.

      • displayString

        public abstract void displayString(java.lang.String message,
                 GeneralView.OutputChannel outChannel)
        Writes the given string to the indicated output channel. This method must be implemented by all GeneralView subclasses.
        Parameters:
        message - The string to display.
        outChannel - The channel through which the message should be displayed.

      • displayObject

        public abstract void displayObject(java.lang.Object object,
                 GeneralView.OutputChannel outChannel)
        Writes the given object to the indicated output channel. The protocol for sending objects must be agreed upon by the view and it controller. This method must be implemented by all GeneralView subclasses.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to display.
        outChannel - The channel through which the message should be displayed.

      • displayList

        public abstract <T> void displayList(java.util.ArrayList<T> list,
                   GeneralView.OutputChannel outChannel)
        Writes the given list to the indicated output channel.
